how_to_get_pcloud_urls: 2. Right-click the video file and select 'Get public link'
3. Copy the sharing URL that looks like: https://u.pcloud.link/publink/show?code=XYZ&filename=your-video.mp4
4. Replace the YOUR_PCLOUD_CODE_X placeholders above with your actual codes
5. Update the filename field to match your actual video filename
_instructions.for_local_development: If videoUrl is not provided, the app will fallback to ./videos/filename for local development
_instructions.github_pages_deployment: Make sure your GitHub Pages is enabled in your repository settings under Pages section
